name: org.karaokivy.players.kivy_audio
title: Kivy Audio Player
short_description: Plays audio files using Kivy's built-in audio player.
long_description:
Plays audio files using Kivy's built-in audio player.
The list of supported formats may vary from one platform to another. You might want to install some codecs on your system to make it support more files.

This plugin is part of Karaokivy's default plugin collection.
